div.head: 逆生
div.div: , birth of [a child in] an unnormal position

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , birth of [a child in] an unnormal position

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ni chan 逆產 , delivery of [a child in] an unnormal position. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 卷 2: 治逆生胎不出方 , “Recipe to cure birth of [a child in] an unnormal position with the fetus failing to leave [the birth canal]”.
